title: Whole Bird How Tos Cooking Times and Temperatures
directions: Approximate Timetable for Roasting a Turkey at 325°F (160°C) or Barbequing at Medium Heat
ingredients: (3.0 – 3.5 kg) 3 – 3 ¼ hours 2 ½ – 2 ¾ hours 1 – 1 ¾ hours
(3.5 – 4.5 kg) 3 ¼ – 3 ½ hours 2 ¾ – 3 hours 1 ¼ – 2 hours
(4.5 – 5.5 kg) 3 ½ – 3 ¾ hours 3 – 3 ¼ hours 1 ½ – 2 ¼ hours
(5.5 – 7.0 kg) 3 ¾ – 4 hours 3 ¼ – 3 ½ hours 2 – 2 ¾ hours
(7.0 – 9.0 kg) 4 ¼ – 4 ¾ hours 3 ¾ – 4 ½ hours 2 ½ – 3 ¼ hours
(9.0 – 10.9 kg) 4 ¾ – 5 ½ hours 4 – 5 hours 3 ¾ – 4 ½ hours

Cooking times may vary depending on: the temperature of the bird going into the oven, the accuracy of the oven’s thermostat, how many times the oven door is opened during roasting, the type and size of roasting pan used and the size of the turkey in relation to the size of the oven.
